amendment.description: To modify the scope of the prohibition on research and development of low-yield nuclear weapons.

vote.text: Amendment SA 751 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 188.

action.text: Amendment SA 751 proposed by Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S6690-6696; text: CR S6690) To modify the scope of the prohibition on research and development of low-yield nuclear weapons.
